Press the + button on the action bar to add a movie to your movie list

Press the plus icon on the actionbar to add movie from online search or to add a movie manually. press the "search" icon to search movie in your main movie list (movie you already add to your list). Long click on a movie will pop up a window with the options to edit movie or the delete the movie from the list.

Press the sharing icon to share the movie via SMS or Email. Press the camera icon or the picture itself to choose or replace a new picture from the gallery or to make a new photo with your camera. In EditMode, press the pencil icon to edit movie information. When you done, press the add button on the button of the page to add the movie to your list.

Press the search area on the action bar to search a movie. To make the search, write via the android virtual keyboard your movie name (or part of it) and then press the search icon on the android virtual keyboard
